website_summaries.verdict: Liquid body foundation that works as a premium, long-lasting, full-coverage tattoo concealer.
pros: Available in 12 shades to suit every skin tone
Great for sensitive skin and allergy sufferers
cons: Will transfer to clothes if not set  properly with powder

customer_reviews.title: Wow Wow wow
customer_reviews.text: I got this in hopes of covering some varicose veins on my legs that popped up during my third pregnancy. Although the color I chose is darker than my skin tone (but will work perfectly after I self tan) this stuff is pretty darn amazing. It blends easily, is buildable, and absolutely positively stays put!!! Even after a shower this stuff will stay on your skin unless you use a makeup remover. I had pretty low expectations because my veins are very large and dark but I was blown away by the results. I am including before and after photos below---photos were taken immediately prior to & following product application. Such a fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.author: InNormal

customer_reviews.title: Hose No More!  Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! I have tons of spider veins, random splotches, etc. and HATE pantyhose. I mean, who wears pantyhose anymore? But I need something or small children will run screaming at the sight of me! This product is the answer - it works so well, my friends demanded a link to it so they could order. Is there a better recommendation I can give you? Now, if you are trying to 100% cover a tattoo - it's not going to do that. If you want to have the look of hose without those evil things - this is the answer! I can't recommend it highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for two weeks on my face and my legs, it works beautifully. Doesn't come off when I sweat and doesn't look cakey. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Riegel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent make up for...legs.
customer_reviews.text: Derma blend gives all who used to enjoy their mini skirts or a pair of shorts to walk the beach but couldn't as aging kicks in, I now can wear what I enjoy by applying a make up foundation on my legs, walk out with confidence until I wash it off. It's a great solution for us, old girls.
customer_reviews.author: M. Oda

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for any blemish on your skin !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for years for my 17 yr old daughter. She has acne on her face,and would keep herself from events outside the home, and this has been a miracle for her. She would even swim in this during the summer, that's how crazy this stuff works. It has never broke her out anymore after the use of it. If your looking to hide any kind of blemish on your skin or even a tattoo, this is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Smb

customer_reviews.title: Covers Dark Purple Leg Scars
customer_reviews.text: Incredible Coverage. My legs have several purple scars due to a skin picking disorder during adolesence. While there is no miracle fix for my leg scars, this is pretty darn close. The foundation is best with multiple layers,applied following product instructions. Great feel and look, does not look cakey. Lasts for a very long time if applied correctly.
customer_reviews.author: eleanor keeler

customer_reviews.title: Soooo awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this stufff is amazing!!!! I’m going to try the face foundation next! I have weird sensitive skin so I’m always hesitant to try anything on my face but I’ll try this because wow just wow!
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I'm fair skinned and it's a beautiful color that goes on like a dream and sets fast. Soaks right it. But the BEST thing is that it covers everything! Spider veins? Kiss them good bye. Bruises, age spots? No more! Worth every penny! And btw I rarely leave reviews.Only if I'm really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: kbuckley43

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Different formula. terrible. Greasy. Burns my skin and eyes. Rubs off very easily, Transfers to everything. DON'T TOUCH YOUR FACE. Does not cover. I want the old formula back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mommarona

customer_reviews.title: This once great product is now a pathetic version of its old ...
customer_reviews.text: Dermablend, what happened!!? This once great product is now a pathetic version of its old self. What once was high quality is now watered down and lacking any ability to cover even the most minor of imperfections. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jan catlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product to cover imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product to cover imperfections, I have very bad varicose veins in the lower front of my right let, can never wear a short dresses because I'm embarrassed, but I cover them with Dermablend and wear skin color panty hose and I'm good to wear knee length dress with confidence. although I had to use a different similar color,because the perfect one for my skin tone is the Caramel color but apparently Amazon does not carry that color, but it worked okay. Thank you, Dermablend
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Don't let them tell you it won't wear off on your clothes!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it covers the spots on my arms. I got two colors to mix. The problem is that it wears off on your clothes! I put the setting powder on, the whole deal, and it still comes off. I am so disappointed as I was hoping to wear it this summer with white. Luckily it came out of my shirt and off my white pants where my arm rubbed!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous!
customer_reviews.text: I consider this product nothing short of miraculous. I'd stopped wearing dresses in the summer due to spider veins, etc. However, the Dermablend Leg and Body MakeupFoundation covers my legs perfectly, hiding veins and smoothing skin tones. When used with the setting powder, the foundation did not rub off on the inside of my dress either. At the end of the day, I knelt down on a white bathroom rug to see what would happen. It left smudges. So just exercise a bit caution while wearing it. I am ecstatic to be able to wear cute summer dresses and sandals again! I HIGHLY recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DD

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover tattoos
customer_reviews.text: I bought the whole Dermablend set to cover up some tattoos on my arms after deeply investigating the best makeup for tattoo coverage. This did NOT work like others have said and I tried and watched tutorials over and over again. I had to return it. The price is way too high for it not to do what it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Please STOP discontinuing shades!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used DermaBlend for 18 years now. I THINK they have changed formulas (or my formula has changed, ha) & the tubes r smaller. Really! Expensive enough!!! But what REALLY gets me is they keep discontinuing shades!!!! Just when ive got a shade down they CHANGE or discontinue. Arrrrr.....
customer_reviews.author: J Wentzel

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! I’ve used body makeup before. I didn’t have the issues I had with this brand. It came off on my clothes even shoes. It was so thick and sticky and seemed to never dry. It covered up veins on my legs so I gave one star, but it had so many other problems. I just washed it off with hot soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hook

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on my stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I recently lost weight and wanted to wear a crop top. First, it didn't cover my stretch marks. I can understand though that this would be difficult because the color is so different. However, it claims to cover stretch marks so I thought it was worth the mention that it didn't cover mine. Second, more than 8 hours after application (with loose setting powder on), I still saw that it was coming off. I put on a new shirt and saw that the foundation stuck on it. I didn't have it on my legs so thank goodness or it would've been all over our furniture.
customer_reviews.author: M. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Body Makeup is a perfect match!
customer_reviews.text: MUST HAVE FOR OLDER SKIN: Needed for summer wedding to smooth out aged skin & cover sun spots. Worked perfectly. Stayed on all night, outside in JUN 2019. I went by my dept store first to get the perfect match - and sand was just enough neutral and great for my skin tone. On my lighter skin, it took me about 4 samples at first. Easy to apply, and def get the powder if you're going to wear for any length of time. Setups with no streaks or runs. Must wash it off, or it will eventually get on your sheets, clothes. I wear everywhere, and makes hands look 20yrs younger!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo GTG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really cover up my tattoo the way I expected. You have to build the coverage and after you set it with powder, it still comes off on your clothes especially if trying to wear pantyhose...I ended up having to purchase slacks to cover my tattoos...I thought it might be my application so I tried twice, had better results the second time around, but the product still came off...
customer_reviews.author: Allison P. Wendell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Covering Spider Veins.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with covering my spider veins around by ankles. You need to use the finishing powder after allowing it to set as instructed. then it doesn't come off. It stayed on during golf and a hot day and was still on that evening. I do recommend that when you shower, to wash it off with soap and a soft brush or wash cloth. Otherwise it will come off on your towels. I feel so much better about how my feet and ankles look when I use th is product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Better, but not gone.
customer_reviews.text: This does improve the look of my spider veins, but definitely does not cover them up completely like the original formula did. I tried multiple coats and drying in between, but it still showed through. The two stars is because it does help, but just not like it used to. The old formulas of this and the cover stick were incredible and made things disappear, the new ones - not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little to no coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Bought product to cover a tattoo located on my back on my wedding day. The tattoo is small, old, and faded. Did not tey product before thw day of the wedding. Based on reviews, I assumed it would have good coverage. It had minimal coverage. My MAC foundation covered 100% better than this product. I plan on teturning it this week.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great lasting coverage but does transfer
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to apply and fix mistakes and good longevity. My only complaint is that it does come off onto clothes, car seats, etc. a bit—especially in the heat. It does come out in the wash or by cleaning car seats. Natural 20 & 30 are both good for neutral skins tones and can be used together for lighter areas (like inside of arms, feet) vs darker areas (tops of arms and full legs). Does last a long time and requires washing with soap to fully remove
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good tattoo cover up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this looking for a product to cover my tattoos while at work. This product did not camouflage my arm tattoos, it simply put a tint on top of my tattoos. I am sure I used enough of the product. I would possibly recommend it for other blemishes, but nothing as dark as a tattoo. I have been impressed with the longevity of the product staying in place and not coming off of my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: which is super fair and as some faint vains
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how much I wish I knew about this product before my wedding. I have a lot of sun damage on my chest and shoulders resulting in tiny broken blood vessels and an overall flush red look. When I apply this to my chest and shoulders it shaves ten years off those areas. I cannot wait for summer time to use this on date nights and getting dressed up. I also tried it on my leg, which is super fair and as some faint vains. Finally I can throw away stocking and streaky self tanners. This is one of my favorite products ever!
customer_reviews.author: Lenore D

customer_reviews.title: If you go into water it will stay pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: you should put hand lotion on legs (to moisturize) then apply product. It will stay on a few days if you don't scrub legs with soap and water. If you go into water it will stay pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: miss manners

customer_reviews.title: ORANGEY AND CAKEY... DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, simply horrible! Did cover the spots on my legs, but it's orangy and cakey. I applied this 3 days ago and it still won't was off and is now streaky and blotchy. The other cover up brand far exceeds this crap.
customer_reviews.author: P Z

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Faded my black line tattoo fairly well, but not completely. It did smudge on my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: LinsG

customer_reviews.title: Hard to match
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good, but very expensive to buy this and then the powder for it to not stain. Maybe I applied it wrong, as it did stain all my cloth. Obviously it's a hassle to remove and the tone was off, not many skin tones to pick from. And it just looks so fake on my legs, didn't even cover my tattoo, I had to apply so many layers to even partial cover it and since the color was off that whole area had to have makeup on.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Just not that impressed with coverage
customer_reviews.text: The old Dermablend was thicker and covered better. This is thin and you have to put multiple coats on. I'm not that impressed with dermablend products because they always have an orangy, pinky hue to them. The old beige was not that orangy when dried. ALso, it doesn't stay on that well compared to the older, thicker formula. It will definitely rub off even with their own setting powder. I actually get better coverage out of my Almay BB foundation. It is a better color match to my skin. I don't know why Dermablend has those pink undertones in their products. I've tried just about every light to warm color and they all have that.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT cover tattoos like it promises to do. I'm VERY disappointed I spent this much money on something that is as good as a $3 foundation from Walmart. I cannot return because it's used now. Not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and most convenient product that I have ever used for my legs. Excellent coverage and wear. I had been previously using the Sally Hansen airbrush legs but you can't apply sunscreen otherwise you will have the streaky shoe polish effect on the beach which is not a good look. I got the light beige shade which gave a very realistic sun kissed glow to my otherwise very pale skin tone on my legs. Not too dark and not orangey at all. You may have to apply another layer or two to any prominent veins but other than that I am very impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MTJR77

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for dark scars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this planning to cover some severe and dark scars I have and the product itself covers VERY WELL, it just did not absorb into the scarred areas unfortunately so it did not cover them and rubbed off or wore off in a short amount of time. This product would probably be best used on older, lighter, smaller scars, or areas of skin that are not scarred. It definitely helps with the areas I have, just not perfect for my needs. Though scarred skin notoriously has a difficult time absorbing lotions and things of that nature so I needed to have anticipated this. Overall still satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Offermann

customer_reviews.title: This is ok
customer_reviews.text: Bruise easily as I have gotten older & it really bothers me. Was looking for something to help hide these on my arms for my daughters wedding & the approaching summer weather . It helps a little but my regular foundation works just as welll .
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Works great, almost too great.....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on my legs. This stuff had my legs looking AMAZING! It works amazingly. HOWEVER!!!!! The transfer is real. Tried to slip some white biker shorts on at the end of a full day of wearing it, and it totally and completely transferred- wardrobe change! Evan after showering that evening and doing what I thought was a good scrub on my legs, the next day, there was transfer onto my shorts. Maybe I should have used makeup removal wipes prior to my shower.... Otherwise, the product works to hide scars, tattoos, whatever!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Not for black and gray tattoos
customer_reviews.text: I got this for tattoo cover up. I have a large, black and gray tattoo on my forearm that has to be covered for work. I read multiple reviews saying this one is good. It is not good at all. I think if the colors were not solid black it would cover better but if you have something solid dark black like mine, look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: pschurkamp

customer_reviews.title: The texture is good, coverage is amazing (truly amazing)
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars if I thought I could find the right color. The texture is good, coverage is amazing (truly amazing). But the color....I'm really fair-skinned and the color I ordered had the right tone, but just not the right color. It looked like old-fashioned nude pantyhose. I probably could keep trying colors but I didn't want to waste the product returning it if I missed. Again, if I had the luxury of having a few colors in front of me to choose the correct one right off the bat, I would be addicted to this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kelle Fecher

customer_reviews.title: Great, but has Drawbacks!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this makeup! I’m 90 yrs old, I bought it to cover the age spots on my legs. It does a great job! Let it dry and definitely use the powder. What I don’t like: It washes off when you take a shower. Be careful when applying as it gets on everything and it’s difficult to remove the stain. It has no longevity, it comes off when you shower.
customer_reviews.author: dolores627

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have varicose veins on my legs and although this product tried concealing them to the point of just lightening the appearance of them, they did not completely conceat them, which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie M.

customer_reviews.title: This Has Given Me A Life!
customer_reviews.text: I have Psoriasis.. I have Been limited in My Social Activities. I turn down All Beach and Cruises due to my Skin condition. I ordered Dermablend in Hope's that I could "Camoflauge" My legs.. I shouldn't have to feel like I need to Camoflauge ME! But..I do. Well let me just say.. I have gone to the Beach, I'm booking a Cruise next year with My Family And I'm wearing shorts and going to my friend's Pool!! This is so Amazing! I'm confident my sister says I'm Beautiful and..Well I recommend this!! 😆
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Spoonamore

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! Really
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Really, really terrific. I was a bit skeptical but it works as advertised!! It lasted ALL day with no issues and did not rub off. I will buy this again. (note: I did purchase the dermablend loose setting powder to set it with and I think that if you want this to last all day, that would be a good thing to do. I love the powder as well). This is NOT greasy and dries very nice to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee in MI

customer_reviews.title: I depend on it!
customer_reviews.text: As I grow older and my skin is thinner, I bruise easily and find that Dermablend covers quite well and seems to last a while. In fact it works so well I have to use very little even if I layer it and wish it came in a smaller tube. I wasn't sure about the skin color but seems to work. At least I don't have to explain my bruises to people who think I was not being treated well by someone!! LOL It does have to dry a little bit before you put clothing on though. I think it's recommended but I don't put powder over it either.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Product rubs off on everything, I even used the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product rubs off on everything, I even used the setting powder with this and it still stained everything I touched. Please save your money it is not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Banfor

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the s***!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a burlesque dancer, and I slather myself head to toe in this before going onstage. Skin looks flawless and smooth. Easily covers scars, stretch marks, body acne, bruises... it hides it all! One tube has lasted me several full body applications. Comes in a lovely pale shade that didn't make me look like I had a fake tan. Unfortunately, it does transfer a bit. I've tried to set it multiple ways, but it still ends up on the inside of my costumes after wear. I would say this product isn't fully water proof, but it is water and sweat resistant. It takes a good scrubbing with soap to get it off at the end of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Ghoulia Child

customer_reviews.title: LIFE changing product!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING PRODUCT! I have a lifetime of scars on my legs from uncontrollable “picking”. They are most often so ugly with sores & scars that I can’t wear shorts or skirts, but with this product I can! The coverage is amazing & it doesn't sweat or run in our hot GA humidity!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I read it would cover my tattoo. I can put 5 layers on and it doesn't cover my tattoo at all. I feel like it was a huge waste of money as the cheap stuff from Walmart covers better. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with it, goes on smoothly with the Aesthetica Body Sponge. I have tried other products on my legs and I like this one the best. When my husband looked at my legs he said you can't see the marks on your legs. My legs were bad. Will continue to order this products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover with the Right Color!
customer_reviews.text: Medium is a little too dark for me, but I decided to keep it because I already had an Ivory. Mixing the 2 works the best for me. So ladies you should think about that. You might need 2 shades, to mix, to get your color. The SPF is 15..not much, so Sun Screen is needed if you plan to be in the sun. Otherwise this is ,so far, the best cover cream I've found, to cover imperfections. For tattoo coverage, though, I might try something else for large pieces.
customer_reviews.author: astro

customer_reviews.title: Oh
customer_reviews.text: Boy, does this leg makeup work great!! I no longer have spots, bruises, spider veins! I can wear capri pants, dresses, etc. without showing the ugly defects in my ankles, calves, arms (which bruise super easy). Absolutely a must for me in the summer. Stays on really well all day and night.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and have acne scars on my legs. Was embarrassed to wear shorts or a dress without stockings. I first purchased this product at Macy's. Then I decided to search this product on Amazon. It covers your scars and I now fell very confident about wearing shorts and dresses above the knee. You really have to let this product dry because it will get on your clothes if you don't. Also, you must get the setting powder as well to help seal in the product. I love it and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Must try, really love it..even a little softens the imperfections
customer_reviews.text: I have the 2 lightest colors and love them both, sometimes mixing them together. Really smooths the look and hides veins and bruises. Just add a little of any make up powder after to set it. Just a little got on the white pool towel, but not bad. Just be careful when applying around clothes. It did wash out if I got a little on them, which was good. I also dab a tiny on my face dark spots after my regular foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Kalin

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the texture of it. When I apply it on my skin its get stuck and i have to rub it really hard to apply it evenly to my body. My skin looks dry also. The color i order is darker on the picture but when I received the actual one its lighter. Its very noticeable on my body because the cream I received is lighter. I bought this last time but not online, the same brand and the same number of the color but it looks different. I don’t know why the one i order here in amazon is lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: After being disappointed by Dermacol’s False advertising, Dermablend was a nice surprise. It does a nice job of covering the unsightly varicose veins on front of my calf. It doesn’t rub off (as much or as quickly) as other options do. Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MCHammerTime

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Bad color choices
customer_reviews.text: You really have to know how to pack it on in thin layers. It took 2 coats to cover my black and grey tattoos on one arm and 3 coats to cover my sleeve which is dark and every color. I didn’t need to do any color correction. It didn’t come off in water(30 minutes) and took a LOT of effort to wash off. I got the lightest shade and it was still too dark for me hence 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t come off!
customer_reviews.text: I went jet skiing and swimming using derma blend on both my legs to hide my severe scarring. It gave me the confidence I needed to enjoy myself. I definitely recommend this, just follow the instructions. I actually watched a couple of YouTube videos to make sure I wore it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: leah hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t offer coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product covered my tattoo initially but was wearing off within half an hour. I followed all the steps per the instructions. My tattoo has a thin black outline with faded red ink and it was clearly visible through the makeup. I figured the warm climate of a destination wedding may have been the culprit so I tried again in moderate temps 65-70 degrees without humidity and had the same poor results.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for scars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It’s spendy so I use it sparingly but it’s been a life changer for me. I have dermatillomania where I pick at my skin so I have scars on my arms and chest primarily. It’s embarrassing to wear sleeveless tops or dresses showing all my scars. This stuff has allowed me to go out in public with confidence wearing what I want. I would also highly recommend the setting powder as I went cheap early on, didn’t buy it, and got makeup on everything as a result. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Greeson

customer_reviews.title: Great body makeup,
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good color for me. Had a darker color that didn’t work at all. Ordered this and when I apply and use the finishing powder, the makeup doesn’t transfer to clothes and other things I come into contact with. It works well on my arms and neck too. I have a ton of freckles since birth and it’s been a challenge to get a good color with foundation and everything else. I’d definitely buy this again. I’m in Arizona so I’ll probably use this a lot in about a month until September or October.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Good buildable coverage
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to pick the right color online, so go towards darker than you think. It covers broken capillaries and bruises very well. Start with a little because it goes a long way and then blend, blend, blend.
customer_reviews.author: Ieduk8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Concealer for Legs
customer_reviews.text: Once you get a good skin match, this Dermablend body makeup is the perfect concealer for skin imperfections...especially the legs. It does not look like you have makeup on! The product stays on for two days and will wash off easily. With leg blemishes (and spider veins) concealed, I have the confidence to wear shorts or short dresses! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: The color was too light but I can see this is going to cover wonderfully! Returning only to get another darker color! Additional review; I returned this for a darker color! Amazing coverage! I use this on my body but also on my face, long long staying power, does not transfer to my clothes, not sticky, covers all my discolorations, even on my hands! Never bought a product like this before! Love this!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TBerg

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says! Uses very little to cover big area
customer_reviews.text: I am going to keep this on hand. Covers dark circles under eyes, and age spots on face. Match the color of your skin and it will erase the areas you don't want to be shown. It doesn't look caked or fake, simply covers up any area you need hidden. My hands have a lot of age spots. Using this, spots are gone! It makes you feel younger!!! I also have received many compliments on my looks and asking what I have done differently!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Do not just buy this without the other products!!
customer_reviews.text: I was in a rush for an event and was applying the foundation and it wasn't quite the right color and I just ended up making a mess because it does not come with any brush or sponge to blend in so I had to go buy that on my own. The most important thing with this is to buy the setting powder and the makeup remover when you are getting the foundation so you will not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ssveag

customer_reviews.title: Not like it use to be.
customer_reviews.text: I have an old tube of this. One swioe it covers and looks, feels great. Had to replace it finally and have to say it was disappointing. It takes 3 layers to cover my scars instead of 1. I bought the right color. It feels light but dry a tad tight on my skin. But still need something. Hopefully the next time is better.
customer_reviews.author: DAR

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage ladies!
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible varicose veins. Like the bulging kind...this stuff really works but you need to nail down just the right color. Having a little trouble with that. But definitely going to keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, gets all over everything.  Not transfer proof
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it looks great on my skin. With that being said, this stuff is messy. It absolutely will get all over your clothing, car seats, furniture etc. I used the setting powder and tried all the tricks. I even stood in front of a fan trying to dry it better. As long as you use it where nothing will touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen from Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Works well but choose a color darker than you think you need!
customer_reviews.text: This product is good, no question there. But choose your color wisely. The colors online are hard to read (at least on my end) and I bought something that is way, way too light for me. So disappointed but I will order again and purchase a darker color. Overall, very happy with the product as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: Deni T

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Covers my uneven legs. Does not completely hide varicose veins, but evens out color. I apply after dry from shower using two hands to cover evenly. Stays on. Let dry completely before putting on slax. Mine is a bit darker than my skin tone so it appears tanned. No streaks if you use two hands. You will have to wash hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money....
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dark circular mark on my leg and I bought this hoping it would cover it up until it clears up on it's own. NOT....didn't cover a thing. To each's own, may work for some, but it didn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: The Diva

customer_reviews.title: Test in store before you order online.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to cover up a tattoo using the websites color matching system. It was way too dark for my skin and I don’t think the web images are a good match. I was going to return it but ended up keeping it for face makeup in photoshoots. It’s definitely too heavy to every day wear, but looked great on film. I would try more of their products but I won’t order them online.
customer_reviews.author: Burke

customer_reviews.title: East to use and very effective.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this lotion - excellent coverage - spreads easily - doesn’t transfer to clothes but will probably get on your sheets but very easily washes out in the washer or just with soap and water. Ideal for summer bare legs - have showered but didn’t soap legs - still some coverage and can always add a little more if necessary. A little spreads a long way. Happy purchase. Can’t speak to sun screen, really - don’t stay in sun.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: This is makeup and not cover!
customer_reviews.text: Now I know the product says makeup but it also promotes it with showing that it covers tattoos. It does not. If you're looking to cover a tattoo you need the "leg and body cover". I didn't realize this because I've been using the same cover for a long time now and dermablend has come out with a lot more products (in the same bottle style) since I've bought it last and I usually go to ulta for it. I'm sure this product is great for what it's supposed to do just wanted people to know it doesn't cover tattoos.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: This time shows through dark tattoos & washes off fairly easily. I was excited hearing about how well this product was, but disappointed with how it actually turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: i have a lot of scars on my legs and it made me super insecure and ashamed to wear shorts, skirts, even my work dress. at least two people a day would ask me what happened and it's just something that makes me really uncomfortable. dermablend helped me find confidence again and i can finally wear all the things i want without being insecure of somebody asking me. it does a great job blends easy and i use like 3-4 layers of it and set it with a pressed powder.
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: if you are trying to cover a tattoo keep looking
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to cover a tattoo, this is not the magic product everyone raves about. I was surprised that my drugstore foundation works better this. Maybe I did not do enough layers with their setting powder but really who has time for that ? Im still not convinced this is any better than less expensive makeup. I was expecting it to be completely opaque- it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Toodles

customer_reviews.title: Skin match and long wear.
customer_reviews.text: The shade was a perfect skin match. I bought it for a relative to cover a few skin imperfections, but found it can be used as regular makeup. It's matted look can be worned without the setting powder, but I use the powder to ensure longevity throughout the day. Moreover, a few layers of coverage will not reflect a skin masked with foundation. Will begin using this as 'my foundation'.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: This cream really does cover skin imperfections beautifully without looking pasty or obvious.. be sure to get the right shade - color is a little lighter than it looks on shade chart. Lasts until you remove it without smearing or transferring
customer_reviews.author: Anilise

customer_reviews.title: This is a godsend!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to purchase some thing for my leg to cover up some imperfections. Problem was my other leg is a prosthetic and I was trying to match the color is closest possible. This product worked perfectly! It matched my other leg and stayed on all day. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Makeup !! but also get White Setting Powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Use it all the time BUT they changed some of the colors. I only ordered product after trying on in store. (Too long wait in retail store). Found on Amazon and ordered it here, But HAVE TO CAREFUL TO MATCH SKIN COLOR! For best effect should also get Setting Powder in White no matter what skin color White setting powder lasts longer & works better..
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: comes off in bed...
customer_reviews.text: comes off in bed and on your clothes unless you set it for dear life with lots and lots and lots of powder, im talking get a whole talc shaker the shake it like a salt shaker.... aside from that it made my skin look amazing. I did not set it well because the color was soo good i did not want to hide it with powder or else it would appear ashy
customer_reviews.author: uppity

customer_reviews.title: One leg with and one leg without makeup.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that this product was long lasting and had great coverage. I’ve dealt with spider veins since my early 20s and have always been embarrassed to wear shorts; even in 100 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Covering bruises on legs
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad bruises on my legs which are permanent. I have used so many other products but Dermablend is the best I have used . It does not completely hide them but better than any other product I have used which is many over the course of a year. Thank you for this product. I ordered it through Amazon in case I did not like it and have to send it back. Dee Hatton I don't mind if you want to use my review. deeandben@windstream.net
customer_reviews.author: Bennett H.

customer_reviews.title: Did not cover as expected
customer_reviews.text: Does not do what it says. I have tried it twice does not truly cover my scars. Last only a couple of days. Not what I was expecting for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mary O.

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover as well as you would expect
customer_reviews.text: I do like that this product minimize my varicose veins but it does not cover them completely but I feel more confident showing my legs when I wear this product. It does not cover it completely so I don't know how they can claim it covers tattoos when it doesn't cover my veins. It does make my legs look a lot better then without so I will be buying this product again along with the setting powder.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend 0/10
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to spread but have almost no coverage. I tried it twice with setting spray and powder. No amount of layering, baking, or setting made a difference. It also dries discolored and splotchy. Nothing good to say here, sadly. Full disclosure, I used it on my collar bone and arm, not my face.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I followed some skin color matching guidelines and ended up choosing a good color for my skin. I’m Asian and the veins on my hands have a bluish color, so I chose 40W Medium Golden. The result is like I got a very light tan and my skin was flawless. And a little goes a long way. I’ll be using it on my legs and feet. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mulawin

customer_reviews.title: It covers good but it leaks everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this stuff works GREAT to cover scars, bruises, even bug bites all over my legs BUT it leaks EVERYWHERE! It gets all over the sheets & blankets and it got on my moms good couch. Other then that I would give it 5 stars I just wish it didn’t leak so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: I have chemical burns and mosquito marks on my legs. They are beautiful now and I can wear shorts. I am a lighter skinned African American woman who ordered a 40N. 40N is a bit too dark and too red for my legs. I need a lighter shade but these will work for now.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Looks cakey.
customer_reviews.text: Very cakey! Looks like funeral home makeup. It also accentuates your lines and wrinkles. I do kind of like it on my legs because it looks like I have on nylons. That is the only reason I am going to keep it. But never can it be worn outside in the sun because it really looks fake. Having said that it is a decent sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this after researching good makeup to cover tattoos
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after researching good makeup to cover tattoos. In my head I was thinking that it would cover my very black arm sleeve but I shouldn’t have expected that. Regardless of that, I am using it as a foundation and it is awesome.. I should probably buy the face makeup but really what’s the difference?? Still love it and still looking for a makeup to cover up dark tattoos other than spray
customer_reviews.author: goldielocks26

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Ehhhh idk maybe I’m just not meant to wear liquid. My friend got some of the 40N shade to cover melisma on her face. It looked great so I thought I would try it. 40N was too light so I went with 40W. They are about 4 shades apart. Extremely dark and very watery and didn’t cover anything. Just made my face orange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for covering scars
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy, needs a few applications to really cover. I used it on an ugly burn mark on the inside of my arm, and it definitely made it way less noticeable. It didn't cover it completely, but enough that it was barely visible. If I had spent more time on it, I probably could have made it invisible, but I didn't have time. It seemed to hold up through the night and didn't transfer to my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: FriendshipStone9

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite make-up
customer_reviews.text: A tiny dab works wonders! I bought this to cover the spider veins on my legs but am using it mostly as my regular make-up because it goes on smoothly and covers so well I don't have to use very much to make my red spots disappear. With a light dusting of powder and blush, and I'm good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Coverage is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I just put some on to see if the coverage is accurate? I can’t say enough good things that for the first time in 30+ years I’m excited to wear shorts and sundress this Summer! I’ll get back to you on how long before I have to re-apply but it is so easy if I have to do every time I want to expose my legs I will do it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Tossona

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cover tattoos/ comes off easily
customer_reviews.text: This product is very thick and honestly has decent coverage as face makeup. As for tattoo coverage, I couldn’t get it to cover the piece on my arm. It transferred onto everything and got makeup everywhere. It also sweats off pretty easily making it streaky and it ends up on clothing. I wouldn’t recommend it, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt cover as well as I expected but still a good product
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt really cover very well. Just makes my tattoo less noticeable. I guess I was expecting it to be totally covered and not visible. Top tattoo in photo has dermablend bottom one has nothing. It does last all day (I'm at about 14 hours in the pic) and it doesn't get on your clothes but it takes a little while for it to set. I got it all over my blazer this morning right after I put it on. But once it sets it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I can say that of all the tattoo cover-up makeup I've bought, this one does work the best. But even still, it takes a lot of layers and its a pain to wait for it to try dry in between. And even with like five + layers, my tattoo is still slightly visible and looks like a bruise. but, better than anything else I tried!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible looks very ashy when applied even in a single layer. It rubs off on everything clothing, car seat etc....dont waste your money get the sally hansen one instead alot cheaper, stays on for as long as you want until washed off and looks very natural. I regret wasting my money on this and now I can't even use it in very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Gia15

customer_reviews.title: Expired Product
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about getting the dermablend leg makeup, and after my first use I noticed my legs were itching, but I ignored it. About a week later I used it again and the itching on my legs got worse and started burning so I knew it was the product. When I looked at the back of tube to read about the ingredients, I then noticed the October 2018 expiration date on a product I purchased on Aug 5, 2019! Im returning for a refund, and Im sad because I couldn't find my shade in the store. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: C. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Save my life in Vegas to look flawless I have couple of bruises that needed to be covered and this brand and color were perfect for me. Beautiful after finish Doesn’t look caky Smooth finish Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Erika

product_meta.title: Dermablend Leg and Body Makeup, with SPF 25. Skin Perfecting Body Foundation for Flawless Legs with a Smooth, Even Tone Finish, 3.4 Fl. Oz.
product_meta.description:
Color:10N Fair IvoryAmazon is an authorized retailer of Dermablend Products. Dermablend Leg and Body Makeup covers up scars, spider veins, varicose veins, stretch marks, bruises, blemishes, and skin imperfections. This leg make up works as a body concealer, temporary sunless tanner, a body BB cream with SPF, body bronzer, or makeup to cover tattoos. Available in twelve fade-proof shades, and without the smell of a self tanner, it leaves the skin with natural looking sun-kissed coverage. HOW TO USE: 1)Using fingers, sponge, or a brush, apply a thin layer to desired area and blend. Do not apply on top of lotion. 2) Once dried, apply a generous amount of Dermablend Loose Setting Powder all over the makeup. Wait 3-5 minutes, and then dust off the excess with a powder brush. This is an essential step for the makeup cover up to be smudge-resistant, transfer-resistant, and longer lasting. HOW TO BUILD COVERAGE: 1) Apply and blend on a thin layer. Let dry, and use Dermablend Loose Setting Powder after each layer. Repeat to build coverage. 2) For tattoo cover up, first apply Leg and Body Makeup. Then glide on Dermablend Quick Fix Body Concealer to cover tattoos. For both applications: layer as needed, let dry, and set with setting powder. HOW TO REMOVE: Use Dermablend Makeup Dissolver to instantly and gently remove high-performance makeup on face and body, including layered makeup that covers tattoos.

BRAND STORY
Powerful Makeup for All. Dermatologist created. High-performance pigments, fragrance-free, allergy-tested, sensitive skin tested, non-comedogenic.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
